info.title: ConnectedCache
info.description: Microsoft Connected cache REST API version 2023-04-01-preview

get.description: Retrieves a list of available API operations
get.summary: Retrieves a list of available API operations under this Resource Provider

200.description: The request was successful; response contains the list of operations under Microsoft.ConnectedCache resource provider

default.description: Error response describing the reason for operation failure. 404 - NotFound (Connected Cache does not exist.)

get.summary: Retrieves information about a customer Enterprise resource
get.description: Retrieves the properties of a Enterprise customer

200.description: The request was successful; response contains the cacheNodes

default.description: Error response describing the reason for operation failure. 404 - NotFound (cacheNodes does not exist.)

put.description: Creates a cacheNodes with the specified create parameters

200.description: The request was successful; response contains the enterpriseCustomers

201.description: The request was successful; response contains the updated Connected Cache node

default.description: Error response describing the reason for operation failure. 404 - NotFound (enterpriseCustomers could not be created/updated)

delete.description: Deletes an existing customer Enterprise resource

200.description: The request was successful; the Cache Node is deleted

204.description: The request was successful; Cache Node does not exist

default.description: Error response describing the reason for operation failure. 409 - Conflict
